Package org.cyclops.evilcraft.blockentity.tickaction.spiritfurnace

Class BoxCookTickAction

java.lang.Object
org.cyclops.evilcraft.blockentity.tickaction.spiritfurnace.BoxCookTickAction
All Implemented Interfaces:
ITickAction<BlockEntitySpiritFurnace>
public class BoxCookTickAction extends Object implements ITickAction<BlockEntitySpiritFurnace>
ITickAction that is able to cook boxes with spirits.
